name: Lash Bash Set
about: What it is: An exclusive, three-piece lash kit with iconic GrandeLASH™, plus two fan-favorite mascaras, to make your lashes the life of the party.Highlighted Ingredients: - Widelash™ (GrandeLASH™): A biotin peptide for fuller-, thicker-looking lashes..- Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17 (GrandeMASCARA): Strengthens and fortifies for healthier-looking lashes..- Castor Oil (GrandeDRAMA): A tried and true favorite rich in omega-6 fatty acids...Ingredient Callouts: It is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: From America’s #1 Lash Serum Brand*, turn up the volume on your lashes with these party-perfect mini lash essentials. Features GrandeLASH™ Lash Enhancing Serum for show-stopping natural lashes, GrandeMASCARA for conditioning length and volume, and GrandeDRAMA for lashes so thick they’ll leave a lasting impression...This Set Contains:.- 0.033 oz/ 1 mL GrandeLASH™ Lash Enhancing Serum.- 0.033 oz/ 1 mL GrandeMASCARA.- 0.033 oz/ 1 mL GrandeDRAMA..*Source: Circana/U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Lash/Brow Treatment Dollar Sales, Skincare Form/Texture: Serum, January – April 2023 combined.
ingredients: -Widelash™ (GrandeLASH™): A biotin peptide for fuller-, thicker-looking lashes. .-Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17 (GrandeMASCARA): Strengthens and fortifies for healthier-looking lashes. .-Castor Oil (GrandeDRAMA): A tried and true favorite rich in omega-6 fatty acids...GrandeLASH™:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Sodium Citrate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide- 3, Arbutin, Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1, Calcium Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita (Metricaria) Flower Extract, Dextran, Disodium Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Glyoxal, Hexylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Metabisulfite...GrandeMASCARA: .Aqua/Water/Eau, Paraffin, Iron Oxides (CI 77499),Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid,Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire d'abeille, Cholesterol, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba)Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire de Carnauba, Triethanolamine,Ultramarines (CI77007),Nylon-12, Cetyl Esters, Glycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Panthenol, Propylene Glycol, (Sunflower) Seed Wax/Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax/Oryza Sativa Cera, Polybutene, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil), Polyglyceryl-3 Rice Branate, Propanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Polyvinyl Stearyl Ether, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-21, Sodium Dehydroacetate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.GrandeLASH-MD Lash Enhancing Serum:.-Apply once daily on a clean, dry lash line using a single stroke on your upper lash line (like a liquid eyeliner)....Warning:.-Do not get into the eye..-Do not use if you are pregnant or nursing, under the age of 18, or undergoing chemotherapy..-Keep out of reach of children..-If redness or irritation occur, stop using product..-Consult physician before use if you are being treated for a facial skin condition..-For more information, read box insert....GrandeMASCARA Conditioning Peptide Mascara:.-Coat the applicator and sweep brush from lash base to lash tips in an upward motion..-Apply multiple coats for volume..-May be removed with makeup remover or soap and water....GrandeDRAMA Intense Thickening Mascara:.-Coat the applicator and sweep brush from lash base to lash tips in an upward motion.
